T02D3260:17a-1: badzra gandh'a r'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3260:17a-3: rdo rje dri ldan ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3260:17a-4: rdo rje dri ldan pa ni nag mo zhal drug
T02D3260:17a-5: phyag bcu gnyis ma ste skra ser po gyen du
T02D3260:17a-6: gyur pa / zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal dang po nag po //
T02D3260:17a-7: gzhan ma rnams ni kha dog rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D3260:17a-8: zhal re re zhing spyan gsum ma /
T02D3260:17a-9: g-yas pa'i phyag drug po rnams na ni rdo rje
T02D3260:17a-10: dang rdo rje dang dril bu dang ral gri dang
T02D3260:17a-11: tri sh'u la dang mda' dang mtshon cha'i 'khor lo
T02D3260:17a-12: rnams so // g-yon pa'i phyag drug po rnams na ni kha tv'am ga dang lcags kyu dang /
T02D3260:17a-13: gzhu dang mdung dang zhags pa dang thugs ka na sdigs mdzub rnams so //
T02D3260:17a-14: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis te bzlas pa'i sngags ni /
T02D3260:17a-15: aom h'um h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'o //
